targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_name"] == "${service}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "process_uptime")
  |> last()

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_name"] == "${service}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jvm_memory_used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["area"] == "heap")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_name"] == "${service}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "process_start_time")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_name"] == "${service}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jvm_threads_states")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_name"] == "${service}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "process_cpu_usage")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_name"] == "${service}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jvm_memory_used")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["area"] == "nonheap")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_name"] == "${service}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jvm_gc_pause")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["cause"] == "G1 Evacuation Pause")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "mean")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_name"] == "${service}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "logback_events")

from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_name"] == "${service}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => contains(value: r._measurement, set: ["jetty_threads_idle", "jetty_threads_busy", "jetty_threads_config_max"]))

panels.description: Number of jobs queued waiting for a thread

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_name"] == "${service}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "jetty_threads_jobs")

panels.title: Jetty jobs

panels.description: The total number of network operations (reads or writes) on all connections

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_name"] == "${service}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kafka_producer_network_io_total")

panels.title: Total network operations

panels.description: The number of network operations (reads or writes) on all connections per second

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_name"] == "${service}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kafka_producer_network_io_rate")

panels.title: Network IO rate

panels.description: The average length of time the I/O thread spent waiting for a socket ready for reads or writes in nanoseconds

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_name"] == "${service}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kafka_producer_io_wait_time_ns_avg")

panels.title: IO wait

panels.description: The average length of time for I/O per select call in nanoseconds

targets.query:
from(bucket: "${bucket}")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_name"] == "${service}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "kafka_producer_io_time_ns_avg")

panels.title: IO time average

panels.description: The total time the I/O thread spent doing I/O

panels.title: IO time total

from(bucket: "${bucket}")

  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["service_name"] == "${service}")

panels.title: Waiting threads

list.definition:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: "${bucket}",
    tag: "service_name",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
list.name: service
list.query:
import "influxdata/influxdb/v1"
v1.tagValues(
    bucket: "${bucket}",
    tag: "service_name",
    predicate: (r) => true,
    start: -1d
)
